attributes.title: Lost cause
attributes.review: I downloaded this in the belief that it could boost my hopes for a re-election, but I was sadly mistaken. This man just isn’t what I thought he was when I voted for him in 2016. He’s not the man I fell in love with. If he ever wants to win back my heart, he truly has to change for the better. I apologize, but I’m calling it quits with him.

attributes.title: Horrible do not download
attributes.review: I just downloaded the app and I can’t even go anywhere I open the app and it just freezes it is so annoying I want to learn more about Trump form this app because I don’t know a lot about Trump and I thought this would’ve been a good app but it is just super bad

attributes.title: So unbelievably bad
attributes.review: I put in my phone number and a few minutes later i got thousands of texts saying “Trump 2020”. They began to say “You idiot, Vote for Trump.” What is this? I then got a call and picked up from the same number that was texting me. It was an old wrinkly man yelling at me vote for Trump or else I’ll get deported. Very disappointed.

attributes.title: No😘😘💖
attributes.review: What happened to making America great again. Orange man isn’t doing a good job. Government really think they’re gonna beat gen z, we aren’t going down without a fight. We already want to die so writing bad reviews is NOTHING. Especially if TikTok will be banned in America then we really gonna fight. Besides Trump just mad are generation smarter.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I opened this app thinking it was for my grandma who supports trump. She has trump everything. But when I opened the app there was a musty dusty crusty Cheetos the the screen😡😡🤬🤬it stayed there for so long and the sight was so horrid it cracked my phone and killed my grandmother🤬🤬😤🤬😡😫This broke my heart. Wasn’t much of a loss though.🧚❤️ Trump 2020🧚🏾‍♂️🧚🥰🤪❤️but make it on a grave 🥰🤣😍😁🧜🏽‍♀️

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Horrible first it took a whole day to download then when it finally downloaded it was so glitchy i couldn’t press or do anything and if i were in the app for more than probably a minute it would kick me out and it gave my phone a virus do not download

attributes.title: disgusting 🤮
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately started to vomit. The first thing I saw was the ugly Cheeto man pooping on himself and crying uncontrollably while in the fertile position. I thought it would get better but it turns out he doesn’t actually have anything in his brain, just a bunch of racist, homophobic, ignorant nonsense. I’m not mad I’m just STRONGLY DISAPPOINTED.

attributes.title: Untrusted
attributes.review: I downloaded it and first thing you have to do is put in your mobile number😠I mean, I’m not giving him my number so he can track me😏 I don’t know what’s past the mobile phone part😤I also don’t care 🥳he needs to get canceled🤩our nation is falling because of him 🤡

attributes.title: Hackers!!!
attributes.review: I was totally fine with the app right up until I put my info in ! All my contacts,photos, and apps were deleted. I can’t log into any of my accounts anymore. They have hackers in there. I can’t get into my emails and it made my phone super laggy and hot. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: AWFUL APP!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Look, I’m all for supporting our president’s app, however, as soon as I downloaded the app, all hell broke loose. I currently have the FBI on my tail because the app has taken control and was downloaded Trump’s kiddie stash onto my device. This happened before the app proceeded to grab me by the p**sy. IT REALLY HURT 😢😭. For the love of God, please don’t download this app
